word: You can pay people to read for you.
meaning: 다른 사람에게 돈을 주고 읽게 할 수 있어요.

word: It wouldn’t matter whether or not I could spell.
meaning: 내가 철자를 쓸 수 있든 없든 상관없을 거야.

word: The whole chalkboard was filled with words.
I’m really glad I decided to become a teacher.
meaning: 저는 선생님이 되기로 결심한 것이 정말 기쁩니다.
